title: Fibrous plaster in Australia
creator_credit: John Kenyon, Gateway Film Productions and M K and M Pictures
brief_description: Shows the mining of gypsum in South Australia, calcining for plaster, harvesting of sisal in eastern Africa for fibre, manufacture of fibrous plaster sheets and forms, and their fixing and joining in modern building construction.
creator_credit_for_label: John Kenyon, Gateway Film Productions and M K and M Pictures
description: Shows the mining of gypsum in South Australia, calcining for plaster, harvesting of sisal in eastern Africa for fibre, manufacture of fibrous plaster sheets and forms, and their fixing and joining in modern building construction.
